Protocols

The following protocols are available globally.

  • DIRegistrationConfigurationDelegate

    Implement this protocol to receive callbacks and display appropriate content when user’s tap on TnC or PrivacyPolicy inside PhilipsRegistration.

    @since 1.0.0

    See more

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @protocol DIRegistrationConfigurationDelegate <NSObject>

    Swift

    protocol DIRegistrationConfigurationDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
  • JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate

    Implement this protocol to be informed about success or failure of PhilipsRegistration URLs, configurations and flow download.

    @since 1.0.0

    See more

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @protocol JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate <NSObject>

    Swift

    protocol JanrainFlowDownloadDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
  • UserRegistrationDelegate

    Use this delegate to receive callbacks about user registration, login, forgot passowrd, resend verfication, account merging and logout events.

    @since 1.0.0

    See more

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @protocol UserRegistrationDelegate <NSObject>

    Swift

    protocol UserRegistrationDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
  • UserDetailsDelegate

    Implement this protocol to receive callbacks about fetching and updation to user details.

    See more

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @protocol UserDetailsDelegate <NSObject>

    Swift

    protocol UserDetailsDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
  • SessionRefreshDelegate

    Implement this protocol to receive callbacks about user session refresh.

    See more

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    @protocol SessionRefreshDelegate <NSObject>

    Swift

    protocol SessionRefreshDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
